casebody.data:
CASES DISPOSED OF WITHOUT CONSIDERATION BY THE COURT FROM FEBRUARY 24 TO JUNE 1, 1909.

No. 155. The Texas & Pacific Railway Company et al., Plaintiffs in Error, v. B. F. Allen. In error to the .Supreme Court of the-State of,Texas. February 24, 1909.

Dis*528missed with costs on motion of Mr. W. L. Hall, for the plaintiffs in error.

Mr. John F. Dillon, Mr. D. D. Duncan and Mr. W. L. Hall for-plaintiffs in error. No appearance for. defendánt in error.
